Components.Abstract.PanelTree

Interface IPanelTreeComp

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPAMOJAComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CPanelTreeComp

    public interface IPanelTreeComp
extends IPAMOJAComponent
    Defines services for interacting with other components ( like, Language, Presentation and CoreHybridEditor components).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Access a CoreHybridEditor component via its interface.

      Access a Language component via its interface.

      Access a Presentation component via its interface.

      Determines if the Panel tree component is in editing mode.

      • Methods inherited from interface Components.IPAMOJAComponent

    • Method Detail

      • getPresentation

        IPresentationComp getPresentation()
        Access a Presentation component via its interface.
        Returns:
        the Presentation interface

      • setPresentation

        void setPresentation(IPresentationComp aPresentation)
        Connect to a Presentation component via its interface. Register for property change events, retrieve box patterns and symbol styles from the Presentation component and (re)create this panel tree.
        Parameters:
        aPresentation - IPresentationComp object.

      • getHybridEditor

        ICoreHybridEditorComp getHybridEditor()
        Access a CoreHybridEditor component via its interface.
        Returns:
        the CoreHybridEditor interface

      • setHybridEditor

        void setHybridEditor(ICoreHybridEditorComp hybridEditor)
        Connect to a CoreHybridEditor component via its interface. Register for property change events, retrieve the AST from the CoreHybridEditor component and (re)create this panel tree.
        Parameters:
        hybridEditor - ICoreHybridEditorComp object.

      • getLanguage

        ILanguageComp getLanguage()
        Access a Language component via its interface.
        Returns:
        the Language interface

      • setLanguage

        void setLanguage(ILanguageComp aLanguage)
        Connect to a Language component via its interface. Register for property change events, retrieve the lexeme and terminal definitions from the Language component and (re)create this panel tree.
        Parameters:
        aLanguage - ILanguageComp object.

      • isStructuralMode

        boolean isStructuralMode()
        Determines if the Panel tree component is in editing mode.
        Returns:
        true if the panel tree is in editing mode, otherwise false.

      • setStructuralMode

        void setStructuralMode(boolean structuralMode)
        Sets the structuralMode of the panel tree.
        Parameters:
        structuralMode - if the panel tree is in editing mode then true, if not in editing mode, false.
